ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Ulysses Cosmic Ray and Solar Particle Investigation (COSPIN) Kiel Electron Telescope (KET) Proton, Helium, and Electron PHA based Fluxes in ASCII Format, Daily Average Data
ResourceHeader.Description: This Data Set contains Daily Average PHA based Fluxes of Protons (34.1-125.0, 125.0-320.0, 320.0-2100.0, >2100.0 MeV), Alpha Particles (34.2-125.0, 125.0-320.0, 320.0-2100.0, >2100.0 MeV/n), and Electrons (2.5-7.0 Mev, 2.5 GV) and the Poisson Uncertainties in those Fluxes
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the COSPIN PI, R. Bruce McKibben, the KET Co-PI, Bernd Heber, and the UDS and/or NSSDC

InformationURL.Name: The Ulysses Cosmic Ray and Solar Particle Investigation, COSPIN
InformationURL.Description: Published Description of the COSPIN Instrumentation, J.A. Simpson et al., Astron. Astrophys. Suppl. Ser. 92, 365-399, 1992. See especially Section 4.5 for a detailed Description of the High Energy Telescopes, HET. An electronic Copy of this Paper is available at http://adsbit.harvard.edu/cgi-bin/nph-iarticle_query?1992A%26AS...92..365S&defaultprint=YES&filetype=.pdf.

InformationURL.Name: User Notes for the COSPIN/KET Data Files
InformationURL.Description: The User Notes File at the Ulysses Final Archive (UFA) describes the Format of the ASCII Data Files for the COSPIN Kiel Electron Telescope Telescope, KET, Daily Average Proton, Helium, and Electron PHA based Count Rates.

AccessURL.Name: Ulysses Final Archive Access to COSPIN/KET Daily Average Proton, Helium, and Electron PHA based Count Rates
AccessURL.Description: ASCII Data File containing all Ulysses COSPIN/KET Daily Average Proton, Helium, and Electron PHA based Count Rates.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the COSPIN KET Co-PI, Bernd Heber, CAU Kiel

Parameter.Name: Time for the record
Parameter.Description: Time for the record given in Year, Day of Year, Hour, Minute, Seconds and coverage in percent. The given time represents the start of the averaging interval.

Parameter.Name: COSPIN/KET Daily Average 34.1-125.0 MeV Proton PHA Derived Count Rates (K3)
Parameter.Description: KET daily average PHA based proton count rates between 34.1 and 125.0 MeV

Parameter.Name: Error in COSPIN/KET Daily Average 34.1-125.0 MeV PHA Derived Proton Count Rates (EK3)
Parameter.Description: error in KET daily average PHA based proton count rates between 34.1 and 125.0 MeV

Parameter.Name: COSPIN/KET Daily Average A01 Detector Counting Rate (A01)
Parameter.Description: daily average KET A01 detector counting rate
Parameter.Caveats: Rate channel A01 includes all particles depositing energy greater than the minimum discriminator level.
